flawed_nl_solution:
If the fan works for 10 minutes each day, in a week with 7 days, it will have worked for 10*7 = <<10*7=70>>70 minutes.
Since a minute has 60 seconds, the total time in seconds that the fan will have worked in one week is 70*60 = <<70*60=42000>>42000 seconds.
Since the fan can create an airflow of 10 liters per second, in 42000 seconds, it will create an airflow of 42000*10= <<42000*10=420000>>420000 liters.
#### 420000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4200, not 42000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
